title: The REAL LIFE Filming Locations of THE BOYS Season 2!
author: Think Story
comment:
🍁🇺🇸 A bit of a departure from my regular videos. Hope you enjoy a little from my hometown! 🇺🇸🍁
For more THE BOYS videos check out this: http://y2u.be/mj_GMYLoz3M
The nail salon where Butcher and the gang find Kimoko’s victim in season 1 was Aroma Spa & Nail salon on College. Source: I’m the cop that hassled Butcher about his accent.
NYC has become such an expensive shithole that even shows depicting NYC doesn't want to film in it
That was fun, the only movie that's ever filmed near where I live was Avengers: Age of Ultron.
There are a lot of movies filmed in my home city Calgary (Alberta) too =D
description:
This video takes a look at the real life shooting and filming locations of The Boys Season 2. Filmed in Toronto we'll look at Vought Tower, Roy Thompson Hall, The Boys base, The Church of the Collective, and much more!
